ComicInfo.Title: The Party; Velvet Glove; The Fairy Frog; The Happy Fisherman; Why I Hate Christians; Ghost World [Part One]; Ectomorph
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Party: Dan goes to a party to meet some people, but they're not there
Velvet Glove: Dan's nightmare about filming his story 'Like A Velvet Glove Cast In Iron'
The Fairy Frog: Adaptation of an Irish folk tale
The Happy Fisherman: The Fisherman has trouble getting to the water
Why I Hate Christians: Why Dan hates Christians
Ghost World [Part One]: Enid and Rebecca slag off the world.
Ectomorph: The pain of being thin
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:14:17. [Issue ID 68666]
